5407.name: Drone TV
5407.description: Join Drone TV now for exclusive aerial content. Elevate your viewing experience with high-quality videography that takes you on exciting journeys around the world, inspiring exploration and adventure.

5430.name: RightNow TV
5430.description: Explosions. Chase scenes. Zero downtime. RightNow TV is wall-to-wall action with hard-hitting shows that don’t let up. If it moves fast, hits hard, or blows up—it’s here.

5735.name: Just for Laughs
5735.description: Silent prank show, where unsuspecting people are hilariously caught in comedic situations, reminiscent of Candid Camera.

Just For Laughs Presents: Funny As Hell

5746.name: ENCORE+
5746.description: Encore+ TV Channel offers a diverse selection of classic and contemporary films, series, and documentaries, celebrating timeless entertainment for all ages. Tune in now on STIRR!

6208.name: Law & Crime
6208.description: Discover the Law & Crime Channel, your go-to source for live trial coverage, expert legal analysis, and gripping true crime stories 24/7. Tune in for the latest!

6435.name: PursuitUP
6435.description: PursuitUP is a television network dedicated to the hunting and fishing lifestyle that millions of people enjoy. With content from over 100 producers. At Pursuit we’ve got something for everyone with a passion for the outdoors. Pursuit UP, We Deliver the Outdoors.

6439.name: Wild TV: Nonstop Outdoor Action & Adventure
6439.description: From big game hunts to wilderness survival, Wild TV brings the thrill of the outdoors straight to your screen. All wild. All the time.
programs: Offroad RVing / The Ultimate Fifth Wheel
Is a Park Model an RV? / Renting

5309.name: Electric Now
5309.description: Catch your favorite TV shows, cult classic movies, and pop culture hits all day, every day with Electric Now. From iconic series to unforgettable films, it’s your go-to channel for nonstop entertainment.

6408.name: Dark Matters TV
6408.description: Dark Matter TV is your go-to channel for horror, sci-fi, action, and true crime. Packed with cult classics, hidden gems, and intense thrillers, it’s genre entertainment the way fans actually want it—bold, curated, and endlessly bingeable.

6595.name: Western Bound
6595.description: Western Bound US: Your 24/7 destination for classic and modern Western storytelling. Immerse yourself in frontier adventures, iconic series, and cowboy legends across multiple streaming platforms. Free, authentic, and always entertaining.
programs: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger

6639.name: Sooner: Next Gen
6639.description: Explore films by emerging filmmakers who bring new talents and innovative views to the screen. Discover the directors and actors shaping the future of cinema with their unique and impactful storytelling.
programs: Le Ciel, la Terre et L'Homme
Another Way to Make a Living

6637.name: Sooner: Coming of Age
6637.description: Coming Age showcases powerful films about growing up from emerging filmmakers. We spotlight fresh voices with bold storytelling, featuring new directors and actors shaping modern cinema. Experience unique perspectives, emotional narratives, and cutting-edge creativity as the future of storytelling u

7017.name: Unleashed by DOGTV
7017.description: Unleashed by DOGTV is the ultimate free streaming channel for dog lovers. We’ve got expert training, wellness tips, adoption stories, heartwarming rescues, fun dog-umentaries, family-friendly shows, and lifestyle content-24/7, all about pups and their people.

7043.name: INWILD
7043.description: INWILD, Insight Global’s nature and wildlife channel, takes viewers on an awe-inspiring journey across the planet, showcasing untamed landscapes, majestic creatures, and breathtaking natural wonders from every corner of the globe

7041.name: INTROUBLE
7041.description: INTROUBLE is Insight TV’s action and sports FAST channel, featuring adrenaline-fueled content like extreme sports, motorsports, and adventure series for Millennial and Gen-Z viewers seeking excitement and real-life stories

7061.name: Wild Nature
7061.description: 24/7 high-def streaming channel showcasing breathtaking wildlife documentaries, exotic habitats, and rare animal encounters from around the globe.

7045.name: INWONDER
7045.description: INWONDER is Insight TV’s science and technology FAST channel, featuring thrilling experiments, A.I., futuristic innovations, space explorations, and the secrets of our planet—blurring the line between learning and entertainment

5748.name: KIDDO+
5748.description: KIDDO+ TV Channel offers 24/7 streaming of engaging movies and series for kids, featuring animation and family-friendly content tailored for young audiences. Tune in today!

6589.name: Teenvee
6589.description:
TeenVee is two incredible shows! Teen-Z tells hilarious stories about students
as they make friends and get into plenty of awkward situations. Avocado Couple combines animation
and humour to highlight the many aspects of relationships.

7269.name: Wine, Watches & Whiskey
7269.description: Sip, savor, and splurge with Wine, Watches & Whiskey—a refined escape into rare vintages, timeless timepieces, and top-shelf spirits. Where luxury meets obsession, 24/7. Taste life’s finer things, only on STIRR.

6585.name: Imagine PlayWorld
6585.description:
Welcome to this extraordinary world, where arts, crafts, and fantasy meet in a
whirlwind of entertainment! This is the ultimate channel for parents, guardians, and kids alike, where
imagination and creativity knows no bounds.

6587.name: Slick Slime Sam
6587.description:
Meet Slick Slime Sam! The most entertaining slime in history and his "pet
human" Sue help with your latest DIY or life hack project, cook incredible food and work together to
find common ground. Sam is pink, hilarious and ready to get to work!

7275.name: Cuisine Culture
7275.description: Taste the world, one show at a time. Cuisine & Culture serves up global flavors, culinary adventures, and the stories behind every dish. From street food to fine dining, discover what brings us together—deliciously, every day.

7323.name: Unchained TV
7323.description: UnchainedTV is a free streaming platform dedicated to vegan lifestyle, plant-based living, and animal rights. Features cooking shows, documentaries, news, and original series promoting sustainable, compassionate living. Available on all major streaming devices.

7305.name: Yachting tv
7305.description: Yachting TV sails you into a world of luxury and adventure—regattas, superyachts, and breathtaking destinations. From racing to cruising, enjoy nonstop coverage and insider stories from the global yachting scene, streaming 24/7 on STIRR

7325.name: Real America’s Voice
7325.description: Real America’s Voice is a 24/7 center-right news and entertainment fast channel featuring live event coverage and commentary that captures authentic American voices and perspectives

7327.name: Weather Nation
7327.description: Weather Nation is a 24/7 channel providing live and recorded weather news, local and national forecasts, severe weather updates, and expert analysis from certified meteorologists—delivering accurate weather information any time you need it.

5288.name: OAN plus
5288.description: One America News Network "OAN" delivers a credible source for national and international news 24/7, including breaking political, business and entertainment headlines.

6921.name: USA Today
6921.description: Breaking news, live events, national stories, politics, sports, entertainment & feel-good features—stream it all 24/7 on the USA TODAY Fast Channel. Fast, free, and always on. Trusted reporting, zero fluff. Only on STIRR.

7271.name: Salem News Channel
7271.description: Salem News Channel delivers 24/7 conservative news, bold opinion, and trusted hosts like Hugh Hewitt and Charlie Kirk. Get up-to-the-minute coverage, fresh perspectives, and real talk—always free, always fearless. Watch now on STIRR and stay ahead with SNC!

7293.name: Screams TV
7293.description: Screams TV delivers nonstop horror—terrifying movies, shocking series, and cult classics that will haunt your dreams. From supernatural chills to slasher thrills, tune in 24/7 for your ultimate scare fix on STIRR.

6414.name: NTD
6414.description: NTD is a New York-based, global television network to bring the world uncensored and truthful information. NTD strives to remain free from external influence—whether from political, financial, or special interests. We have rapidly emerged as a leading independent news broadcaster.

6701.name: Al Jazeera
6701.description: Al Jazeera delivers bold, global news coverage 24/7. From breaking headlines to deep dives—watch it all free, wherever you are. No hype. Just news.

6759.name: DeFiance Media
6759.description: Where tech meets culture. DeFiance Media dishes up nonstop takes on Web3, blockchain, AI, and the wild world of decentralized everything—with news, shows, and smart humans (and bots) at the mic.

6441.name: My Money
6441.description: “My Money” FAST channel offers free, ad-supported financial content, including market updates, investment tips, and personal finance advice. Available on smart TVs and streaming devices, it provides 24/7 programming with targeted advertising, catering to viewers seeking accessible financial info.

7295.name: Gritos TV
7295.description: Gritos TV te trae terror sin parar: películas espeluznantes, series impactantes y clásicos de culto que te pondrán los pelos de punta. Disfruta sustos sobrenaturales y emociones fuertes, 24/7 solo en STIRR.

6430.name: GenB TV
6430.description: Generation Black TV is a streaming platform that celebrates and amplifies Black excellence by showcasing content created by and for the global Black and African American communities.

7297.name: Mi Miedo Canal
7297.description: MI MIEDO CANAL is your home for nonstop horror—chilling movies, haunting series, and cult classics that will keep you on edge. From supernatural scares to psychological thrillers, get your daily dose of fear 24/7 on STIRR.

771.name: FITE 24 7
771.description: Experience FITE TV: Your ultimate combat sports destination. Stream live boxing, MMA, wrestling, and more. Enjoy exclusive events, PPV matches, and on-demand content 24/7!

7063.name: MVMT of Culture
7063.description: MVMT of Culture Channel: Celebrate Black and urban culture with 24/7 free streaming—movies, music, interviews, and original shows, spotlighting top talent and community stories

Jeff Glover vs Caio Terra BJJ Breakdown

6593.name: 123 GO!
6593.description:
School, DIY, life hacks, pranks, beauty tips, myth-busting, comedy and much,
much more! 123 GO! is a show about everything that’s trending right here, right now, taking on
challenges with optimism, curiosity and a little adventure!

7303.name: Horizon Sports
7303.description: HORIZON SPORTS is your 24/7 channel for outdoor adventure and active living. From trail running to cycling, mountain sports to wellness journeys, catch inspiring stories and nonstop action that fuel your passion for the great outdoors on STIRR.

6425.name: TRACE Sportstar
6425.description: TRACE Sport Stars is the first channel exclusively dedicated to sports celebrities. TRACE Sport Stars gives unique behind-the-scenes access to athletes, offering an intimate and in-depth understanding of their lives.

5721.name: Automotions
5721.description: Automotions offers new car model reviews, including trailers, interior and exterior shots, and driving scenes. The channel also includes interviews with popular figures in the automotive industry.

7277.name: DRIVE+SPEED
7277.description: Buckle up for nonstop thrills. DRIVE+SPEED brings you the world’s fastest cars, epic races, and high-octane adventures. From classic rides to cutting-edge machines, it’s all about horsepower, speed, and the pure joy of the drive—24/7.

6424.name: SPEED SPORT 1
6424.description: Rev up for totally free live racing! Speed Sport 1 brings you hundreds of motorsports events from drag strips to road courses, plus shows like Mobil1 The Grid. No subscriptions, no fees—just pure racing action on all your favorite streaming apps. Watch Instantly for Free on STIRR

6411.name: Fuel TV
6411.description: Fuel TV is a sports-orientated streaming action sports channel owned by FUEL TV Global, S.A. The channel is focused on the culture of extreme sports such as skateboarding, snowboarding, wakeboarding, motocross, surfing, BMX, FMX and is available in many countries.

7307.name: Powertube TV
7307.description: POWERTUBE TV fuels your passion for all things automotive—high-performance builds, custom rides, and the latest gear. From muscle cars to off-road beasts, get your daily dose of horsepower, mods, and automotive culture, streaming 24/7 on STIRR.

1072.name: Channel Fight
1072.description: Channel Fight TV is your ultimate destination for live combat sports, featuring thrilling boxing, MMA events, and exclusive interviews with fighters and experts. Tune in now!

5730.name: Nitro TV
5730.description: Nitro TV Channel is your go-to destination for high-octane entertainment, featuring thrilling motorsports, monster truck races, and adrenaline-fueled shows for the whole family!

7279.name: Fight TV
7279.description: Step into the ring with Fight TV—your nonstop destination for live bouts, legendary matchups, and behind-the-scenes action. From boxing to MMA and beyond, it’s all the hits, heart, and high drama of combat sports, streaming 24/7.

1549.name: Extreme+
1549.description: The original extreme sports channel, bringing global audiences the best mix of extreme sports from around the world 24.

7273.name: MMA TV
7273.description: We’re bringing you nonstop MMA action—fights, knockouts, and all the adrenaline you crave. Catch live bouts, classic matchups, and exclusive behind-the-scenes moments. MMA TV is your home for combat sports, 24/7. Let’s get ready to rumble!

5300.name: The Grappling Network
5300.description: The Grappling Network connects martial arts enthusiasts through training resources, expert insights, and a vibrant community. Join us to enhance your skills and network!

College Wrestling -Utah Valley vs. California Baptist
Jeff Glover vs Caio Terra BJJ Breakdown

7283.name: Goal TV
7283.description: Goal TV is your nonstop home for the world’s greatest game. Watch live matches, epic goals, and unforgettable moments from top leagues and global tournaments. All the action, drama, and passion of soccer—streaming 24/7 on STIRR.

7281.name: Fooseball TV
7281.description: It’s game on 24/7 with FOOSBALL TV! Watch epic matches, trick shots, and pro tips from the world of table soccer. Whether you’re a fan or a player, this is your home for nonstop foosball action, competition, and community—only on STIRR.

5306.name: World Poker Tour
5306.description: Catch every bluff, bet, and big win on the World Poker Tour TV Channel. With high-stakes games, global tournaments, and expert insights from poker pros, it’s your all-in destination for nonstop poker action.

7285.name: Homerun TV
7285.description: Homerun TV brings you nonstop baseball action—live games, classic moments, and epic home runs from the diamond. From big league legends to rising stars, catch every swing, pitch, and play. Baseball lives here, 24/7 on STIRR.

7287.name: Hoop TV
7287.description: Hoop TV is your 24/7 home for basketball—live games, buzzer-beaters, and legendary plays from courts around the world. From pro leagues to streetball, catch all the action, highlights, and hoops culture, streaming nonstop on STIRR.

5305.name: Sports First - Stream Free Now
5305.description: From jaw-dropping stunts to unforgettable athlete stories, Sports First brings you the best in action, adrenaline, and all things sports from sources like Red Bull Media House. Whether you’re a hardcore fan or just love a great highlight reel, this channel brings the heat.

5291.description: HSN (Home Shopping Network) offers exclusive products and top brands in beauty, jewelry, home, fashion, and electronics, providing an interactive shopping experience via TV, streaming, and online platforms

5417.name: Shop LC
5417.description: Deals drop daily on Shop LC—live shopping, steals, and style delivered 24/7. Stream it free, wherever you are. No hassle, just awesome finds.

5395.name: ONTV4U - Free Live Shopping & Lifestyle TV
5395.description: Discover amazing deals live! Watch OnTV4U’s free shopping channel featuring the latest beauty makeovers, kitchen gadgets, and home innovations. Shop what you see - stream what you love, totally free on STIRR.

6581.name: 5-Minute Crafts
6581.description:
5-Minute Crafts is the world’s most popular DIY channel, known for its positive,
fun, and quirky crafts. The channel shows helpful ideas for projects that empower viewers to solve
everyday problems with creative and simple solutions. (TheSoul)

5289.name: AWE plus
5289.description: Explore the world in style with AWE Plus—where breathtaking travel, epic adventures, and luxury living meet. From dream destinations to culinary delights, AWE Plus inspires every step of the journey.

5428.name: JLTV
5428.description: Jewish Life TV offers engaging programming that celebrates Jewish culture, traditions, and values, featuring documentaries, lifestyle shows, and community stories for all ages.

5299.name: Freebie TV - Watch Live Instantly
5299.description: Your new favorite channel is totally free (and totally awesome). Freebie TV’s got everything—classic shows, binge-worthy series, and hidden gems you’ll actually want to watch. No subscriptions, no tricks, no BS. Just great TV that won’t cost you a thing. Stream smart, spend zero.

6413.name: CraftsyTV
6413.description: CraftsyTV is your online resource for all creative makers, where you can find everything you need – from basic instruction to advanced techniques.
